CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(SPEN_Rating__c)="5",IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 Stars"),
IF(TEXT(SPEN_Rating__c)="4",IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 Stars"),
IF(TEXT(SPEN_Rating__c)="3",IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 Stars"),
IF(TEXT(SPEN_Rating__c)="2",IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2 Stars"),
IF(TEXT(SPEN_Rating__c)="1",IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1 Star"),
IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "0 Stars"))))))
CustomField.label: Star Rating
